mapper.sql: id , is_delete, gmt_create, gmt_modified, operation_name, request_start_time, global_trace_id, current_segment_id, parent_segment_id, spans, reorganizing_spans, user_name, token, service_code, service_instance_name
mapper.select: select id, operation_name, request_start_time, reorganizing_spans from segment where current_segment_id = #{segmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc limit 1
select id, operation_name, request_start_time, reorganizing_spans from segment where global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into segment ( operation_name, request_start_time, global_trace_id, current_segment_id, parent_segment_id, spans, reorganizing_spans,user_name, token, service_code, service_instance_name ) values
( #{item.operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.currentSegmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parentSegmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.spans,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.reorganizingSpans,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.serviceInstanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
on duplicate key update operation_name = values(operation_name)

is_delete,

mapper.update:
update segment
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation_name = #{operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_start_time = #{requestStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_segment_id = #{currentSegmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_segment_id = #{parentSegmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spans = #{spans,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
reorganizing_spans = #{reorganizingSpans,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
